moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Reflective DLL Injection Module
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will inject a specified reflective DLL into the memory of a
        process, new or existing. If arguments are specified, they are passed to
        the DllMain entry point as the lpvReserved (3rd) parameter. To read
        output from the injected process, set PID to zero and WAIT to non-zero.
        Make sure the architecture of the DLL matches the target process.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>
b4rtik

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PATH
options.description: Reflective DLL to inject into memory of a process

options.name: WAIT
options.description: Time in seconds to wait before reading output

options.name: KILL
options.description: Kill the injected process at the end of the task
